paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate the positive influence dominating set (PIDS) which has applications in social networks. We prove that PIDS is APX-hard and propose a greedy algorithm with an approximation ratio of H(delta) where H is the harmonic function and delta is the maximum vertex degree of the graph representing a social network. paper_title: On positive influence dominating sets in social networks
